TopicTitle: KSP freezes up on entering buildings

Articles.Content:
After i came back from an EVA where a kerbal died i tried to build a new craft. I constructed the basics of an pod for 3 kerbin plus an science laboratory. after that the game stopped responding before i could continue building. after restarting the came i can not enter the hangar. when i enter other buildings and exit KSP freezes up. the game did not send any crash report nor did windows recognized the game was not responding. the time in the game was continuing, i was unable to check what parts of the game where not responding. it occoured after firing an kerbal that was KIA

Kerbal space program version:

0.90.0 Beta

Saved game files:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4c4dho6cvg1o2z9/Tretron_save.rar?dl=0

output log:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/zg3ui3kk9tjnkte/output_log.txt?dl=0

System info:

motherboard: EVGA 780I

CPU: Q6700 @ 3.0 Ghz

mem: 4gb DDR2

videocard: evga 770 GTX

Checked solutions:

- Put the "CrewRosterFreezeFix.dll" into the kerbal space program/GameData folder and relaunched the game.

i hope this problem is known and their is a solution for this.

Edited December 31, 2014 by tretron
added system info + possible fix

Looks like you fired a Kerbal who had completed a mission. AFAICT, the only Kerbal you fired is Jebediah, so you should be able to fix it by editing him back into your persistence.sfs. Add him in the ROSTER{} section like so:

    ROSTER
    {
[COLOR=#ff0000]        KERBAL
        {
            name = Jebediah Kerman
            type = Crew
            brave = 0.5
            dumb = 0.5
            badS = True
            state = Dead
            ToD = 0
            idx = 0
            CAREER_LOG
            {
                flight = 0
            }
            FLIGHT_LOG
            {
                flight = 0
            }
        }[/COLOR]
        KERBAL
        {
            name = Bill Kerman
            type = Crew
            brave = 0.5
            dumb = 0.8
            badS = False
            state = Available
            ToD = 0
            idx = 1
            CAREER_LOG
            {
                flight = 1
                0 = Land,Kerbin
                0 = Flight,Kerbin
                0 = Recover
            }
            FLIGHT_LOG
            {
                flight = 1
            }
        }
...

I've set him to Dead so you won't get him back unless you have the default zombie Kerbal setting.
Thanks Master Tao, The game runs again.

Just FYI, if you set him to dead, he will never respawn even if respawn is on.

As a side note, I've created a fix to help avoind this in the future. If you aren't opposed to add-ons, you can find it here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v0-90-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-(Release-v0-1-7b-29-Dec-14)

Cheers,

-Claw

i have installed the fix, but it did not work. only with the fix of master tao the game works again
